column1: Uchi////I come here pretty often and my expectations are always exceeded. However
column2: I came during the day and the food was so lackluster... everything's temperature was off. Hot foods weren't hot enough. The pistachio desert was awful
column3: sorbet tasted like straight vinegar and the cake was dry.. first desert I've had here that I did not like. This is my favorite restaurant but the food was just off.. not sure if it's because it's morning shift and the chefs aren't as knowledgeable or what ‍
